Package org.klotski.controller

package org.klotski.controller
This package contains Controller classes, that are useful to do few but optimized things
These classes are designed to work as a link between Window and Coding classes.
To use this package at the best possible, is it preferable to call these classes and relative function inline.
In fact, every class has one or more methods that can be called to do a specific action.
Since:
05/15/2023
See Also:
  • org.klotski.graphics
  • org.klotski.coding
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BestMoveController
    BestMoveController is a controller class that is used to do the best next move.
    It dialogues with Window, NextBestMove and BoardImp.
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    BoardSelectController
    BoardSelectController is a controller class that is used to Select or Deselect a Block.
    It dialogues with Board.
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    HistoryController
    HistoryController is a controller class that is used to set a game starting by a configuration or get a score.
    It dialogues with Window, Board, HighScoreUpdater
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    IncrementsMoveController
    IncrementsMoveController is a controller class that is used to increment or decrement the number of moves.
    It dialogues with Window, Board, BoardImp, GameSaver, HighScoreUpdater
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    InfoController
    InfoController is a controller class that is used to display info about the game.
    It dialogues with Window
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    MoveController
    MoveController is a controller class that is used to Move a single Block piece.
    It dialogues with Window, Board, BoardImp
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    OpenFileController
    OpenFileController is a controller class that is used to Open a saved game.
    It dialogues with Window, Board, HighScoreUpdater
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    QuitController
    QuitController is a controller class that is used to quit the game.
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    It uses the default Constructor cause there is no necessity of storing any other data from other classes
    ResetController
    ResetController is a controller class that is used to reset current game.
    It dialogues with Window and BoardImp
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    SaveFileController
    SaveFileController is a controller class that is used to change where to store current game log.
    It dialogues with Window
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    SaveGameController
    SaveGameController is a controller class that is used to save current game log.
    It dialogues with Window and GameSaver
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    SelectConfigurationController
    SelectConfigurationController is a controller class that is used to change the current configuration.
    It dialogues with Window, BoardImp
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
    UndoController
    UndoController is a controller class that is used to undo previous move.
    It dialogues with Window, GameSaver, BoardImp, Board
    It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
